story_line.text: The first customer enters the shop.
I've got work to do, be brief.
No issue, I'm here to help.
You are going to receive your part, so help me out.
Exatcly how a smithy should be. I would like to order a sword.
Perfect. Then I am going to order the strongest sword that you can make.
Understood. I will start the work and get back to you once the sword is ready.
